metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14265 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: A Stack-based Buffer Overflow was discovered in xtrans_interpolate in internal/dcraw_common.cpp in LibRaw before 0.18.3. It could allow a remote denial of service or code execution attack.

notes.Note: leosilva> the two lines entry in changelog refers for CVE-2017-13735 and this CVE respectively

criterions.comment: darktable package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
dcraw package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
exactimage package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
kodi package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
libraw package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.18.5-1').
rawtherapee package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
